mapper.sql: fid, fuid, fname, fbanknumber, fbanktype, fcreatetime, fstatus, version, init, faddress, frealname, fprov, fcity, ftype, fdist
mapper.insert: insert into f_user_bankinfo ( fuid, fname, fbanknumber, fbanktype, fcreatetime, fstatus, version, init, faddress, frealname, fprov, fcity, ftype, fdist ) values ( #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbanknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbanktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{init,jdbcType=BIT}, #{faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fprov,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fdist,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE from f_user_bankinfo WHERE fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND fuid= #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update f_user_bankinfo set fuid = #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fname = #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbanknumber = #{fbanknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbanktype = #{fbanktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcreatetime = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fstatus = #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = version + 1, init = #{init,jdbcType=BIT}, faddress = #{faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frealname = #{frealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fprov = #{fprov,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcity = #{fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ftype = #{ftype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fdist = #{fdist,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and version = #{version}
